item.title: Cloudant: CouchDB as Backend
item.description: There have been a lot of guides on how to use CouchDB as a database for the web while restricting users to write only the data they own. I have been recently experimenting with how to use Cloudant’s CouchDB as a backend directly for one of my Single Page Applications [SPA]. This blog post gives a little perspective on the limitations of the idea and how to achieve it.
